The '''Seven Hoards of the Dwarf-kings''' were legendary treasures of the [[Dwarves]]. The name suggests that each hoard belonged to one of the seven [[:Category:Dwarven clans|Dwarven clans]]. As it is said, the foundation of each hoard was a golden ring, and they were probably gathered thanks to the [[Seven Rings]] given to the Dwarves by [[Sauron]] in the [[Second Age]].

By the [[Third Age]], the hoards had been plundered and devoured by [[Dragons]].<ref>{{S|Rings}}</ref> 

[[Smaug]] had once claimed a dwarven-hoard, but it is not known if it was one of the Seven Hoards.
